allow: Bash(/mnt/c/flutter/flutter/bin/dart pub global run build_runner build:*)
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "flutter analyze 2>&1 | Select-String -Pattern ''error -'' | Measure-Object | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Count")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "flutter analyze 2>&1 | Select-String -Pattern ''warning -'' | Measure-Object | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Count")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "flutter analyze 2>&1 | Select-String -Pattern ''info -'' | Measure-Object | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Count")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "flutter analyze 2>&1 | Select-String -Pattern ''uri_does_not_exist'' | Measure-Object | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Count")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "flutter analyze 2>&1 | Select-String -Pattern ''undefined_'' | Measure-Object | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Count")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "flutter analyze 2>&1 | Select-String -Pattern ''ambiguous_import'' | Measure-Object | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Count")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "flutter analyze 2>&1 | Select-String -Pattern ''missing_required_argument'' | Measure-Object | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Count")
